title: Integrative Medicine
description: Integrative medicine at Beaumont Health directly affects the body's physiological healing process while gently awakening the mind-body-spirit connection.
cleaned_text: Our integrative medicine team combines traditional and holistic treatment options to help with illness, optimize overall health and promote well-being. Our services can help anyone living with chronic pain, anxiety, insomnia, GI issues or those who are undergoing cancer treatment. Talk with one of our team members today to learn how we can partner with you to help you manage your health and improve your quality of life. There are numerous places you can start your journey into integrative medicine. Check out the treatments, classes, and training programs offered below to learn more. Forms to be completed prior to
